name: Vishwask Force
description:
Fly around in an air tank. Take down incoming enemies while avoiding their bullets. Avaliable in a demo version as well as a full version.  

Best played with a Joystick (the instruction are based on the SteelSeries Stratus XL  which is very similar to the Xbox controller mapping) or you keyboard.

The featurs for both versions are:

  • 3 difficulties for each stage. Don't think they will be the same either.
  • You can be so focused that you missed dinner. 
  • Awsome power-ups to help you through a tough level.  

We plan to released even more stages in the future. Please support us to make that happen.
